column4: Is anyone else having trouble installing themes and/or icon sets in 8.04?
What trouble are you having? Are you installing themes using .debs or by hand? I'm about to try doing one by hand, it'll be interesting to see if I run into issues....
the normal, System/Preference/Appearance and then drag+drop the theme isn't working. It says "New Theme Installed" and then ever switched, or displays it is an available option.
Okay. I'll have a quick scan of the docs to see if I run into any obvious issues, but I don't usually install themes that way and can't help very much. :-(
